document_data.mainbody:
Blackraven Wagons, Doors, and Shutters was a woodworking shop run by one of Sundabars famous master carpenters, Hundarr Blackraven. It was an extremely efficient workshop, providing high-quality pieces in a short amount of time.
While Hundarr and his apprentices specialized in only the specific items advertised in the name of his shop, they were simple and strong pieces, with exceptionally sturdy joints and hinges.
